question: Will Ousmane Dembélé score a goal in the 2025 Champions League Final?
description:
This market refers to the Champions League final match between Paris Saint-Germain and Inter Milan scheduled for May 31, 3:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if listed player scores more than 0.5 goals. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market, goals scored during extra time will count. However, goals from a penalty shoot-out will not be counted. 

If the Champions League Final has not been completed by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "50-50". 

The resolution source for this market will be Champions League (https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/).

question: Stars vs. Oilers
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for May 27 at 8:00PM ET:
If the Dallas Stars win, the market will resolve to “Stars”.
If the Edmonton Oilers win, the market will resolve to “Oilers”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Paris Saint Germain win on 2025-05-31?
description:
In the upcoming UCL game, scheduled for May 31 at 3:00PM ET,
If Paris Saint Germain wins, this market will resolve to “Yes”.
If Paris Saint Germain loses, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve “No”.
This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

question: Giants vs. Tigers
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for May 26 at 1:10PM ET:
If the San Francisco Giants win, the market will resolve to “Giants”.
If the Detroit Tigers win, the market will resolve to “Tigers”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.
